#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main(){
	long long t,n,x[4],y[4];
	cin>>t;
	
	for(long long z=1;z<=t;z++){		
		for(long long i=0;i<4;i++) cin>>x[i]>>y[i];
	
		long long b = 0,a=0;
		for(long long i=0;i<4;i++){
			long long dx = abs(x[i] - x[(i+1)%4]);
			long long dy = abs(y[i] - y[(i+1)%4]);
			b += __gcd(dx,dy);
			a += (x[i]*y[(i+1)%4] - y[i]*x[(i+1)%4]);
//					cout<<a<<" "<<b<<endl;
		}
		a = abs(a)/2;
		long long ans = a+1 - b/2;
	//	cout<<a<<" "<<b<<endl;
		cout<<"Case "<<z<<": "<<ans+b<<endl;
	}
}
